<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>budget cost read only in case of upgrade</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
gr.addQuery('name','planned_task');
gr.addQuery('element','budget_cost');
gr.query();
if(gr.next() && !gr.read_only){
	gr.setValue('read_only',true);
	gr.update();
}
]]></script>
